comment: As the creator of the most engaged with post in the News section of Gab, I was shocked to observe how many Gab users insisted how much they didnt care about my post by choosing to care enough to actively post a comment instead of simply ignoring it. So why did you care so much about my post, Gab?
amr:
# ::snt As the creator of the most engaged with post in the News section of Gab, I was shocked to observe how many Gab users insisted how much they didnt care about my post by choosing to care enough to actively post a comment instead of simply ignoring it. So why did you care so much about my post, Gab?
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (s / shock-01
            :ARG0 (o / observe-01
                  :ARG0 (ii / i)
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / insist-01
                        :ARG0 (p / person
                              :ARG0-of (u / use-01
                                    :ARG1 (p2 / product
                                          :name (n / name
                                                :op1 "Gab")))
                              :quant (m2 / many))
                        :ARG1 (c / care-01
                              :polarity -
                              :ARG0 p
                              :ARG1 (t / thing
                                    :ARG1-of (p3 / post-01
                                          :ARG0 (ii3 / i)))
                              :manner (c2 / choose-01
                                    :ARG0 p
                                    :ARG1 (c3 / care-01
                                          :ARG0 p
                                          :ARG1 t
                                          :ARG1-of (h / have-quant-91
                                                :ARG3 (e / enough)
                                                :ARG6 (p4 / post-01
                                                      :ARG0 p
                                                      :ARG1 (t2 / thing
                                                            :ARG1-of (c4 / comment-01))
                                                      :ARG1-of (a / activity-06
                                                            :ARG0 p)
                                                      :ARG1-of (ii4 / instead-of-91
                                                            :ARG2 (ii5 / ignore-01
                                                                  :ARG0 p
                                                                  :ARG1 t2
                                                                  :ARG1-of (s2 / simple-02)))))))))
                  :ARG1 ii3)
            :ARG1 ii3)
      :snt2 (c5 / cause-01
            :ARG0 (a2 / amr-unknown)
            :ARG1 (c6 / care-01
                  :ARG0 (p5 / person
                        :name n
                        :op1 "Gab"))
            :ARG1 (t3 / thing
                  :ARG1-of (p6 / post-01
                        :ARG0 ii3))
            :ARG1-of h
            :ARG2 (m3 / much)
            :ARG3 (s3 / so)))

comment: Both the pejorative use of the "n-word," and hate speech directed toward homosexuals, do not have a place here and must be avoided.
amr:
# ::snt Both the pejorative use of the "n-word," and hate speech directed toward homosexuals, do not have a place here and must be avoided.
(a / and
      :op1 (h / have-03
            :polarity -
            :ARG0 (a2 / and
                  :op1 (u / use-01
                        :ARG1 (w / word
                              :mod (n / nigger))
                        :mod (p / pejorative))
                  :op2 (s / speak-01
                        :ARG1 (h2 / hate-01)
                        :ARG1-of (d / direct-01
                              :ARG2 (h3 / homosexual))))
            :ARG1 (p2 / place
                  :location (h4 / here)))
      :op2 (o / obligate-01
            :ARG2 (a3 / avoid-01
                  :ARG1 a2)))
